text.jpText:
オグリ先輩！　昨日ラーメンを食べながら
廊下を歩いていたというのは、本当っスか！？
text.enText:
Oguri-senpai! Is it true that you 
were walking down the hallway yesterday 
while eating ramen?

text.jpText:
うむ。食事中に緊急の用事ができてな。
とはいえラーメンが伸びてしまったら、
作ってくれた人に申し訳なく。
text.enText:
Hmmm. I had to take care of something 
urgent while I was eating. However, 
if the ramen gets too long, I'm sorry 
to the person who made it. I felt sorry 
for the person who made it.

text.jpText:
そうだったんスか……。過度な食べ歩きは
風紀委員として見過ごせないっスけど、
そういう事情なら仕方ないっスね。
text.enText:
I didn't know that.…… As a member of the 
public morals committee, I can't overlook 
excessive eating. I'm sorry, but if that's 
the case, I can't help it.

text.jpText:
でも、スープがこぼれてヤケドするかも
しれないので、もうやらないでほしいっス。
text.enText:
However, I hope they don't do it again, 
because the soup might spill and burn you.

text.jpText:
わかった。今後は気をつける。
理解してくれてありがとう。
text.enText:
I understand. I'll be careful from now on. 
Thanks for understanding.

text.jpText:
いえ、当然のことっス。
ご飯を粗末にしちゃダメっスからね。
text.enText:
No, of course not. Don't take the food for 
granted, you know.

text.jpText: ちなみに、緊急の用事って何だったんスか？
text.enText: By the way, what was your urgent business?

text.jpText:
ああ。家庭科室で、先着20名に
カップケーキを配ると聞いてな……！
text.enText:
Oh. I heard they're giving out cupcakes in 
the home economics room to the first 20 
people who show up. ……!

text.jpText: 思ってた用事と違ったっス！
text.enText: This is not what I had in mind!
